review: After using this stick for awhile I am not supper impressed by it. Currently I much prefer my Roku stick and there is one big reason why. All the optional or hidden channels that you can access through Roku. Amazon does not have anything like that and honestly that is what is killing the Fire TV Stick for me. I understand the desire of Amazon to be able to control what content a person can utilize by their product, I have an iPhone 6 and that is something Apple is famous for doing. Still though, when the leader in the industry offers more options right away, it should tell Amazon that they needed to do the same thing. It's not a bad product if you haven't used any other internet TV streaming option before, it is just lacking if you have. Yes I know I can play games with this, and I do, it isn't what I watch tv for though.

review: Easy to set up. Sometimes the Wi-Fi Connection is interrupted, despite being very close to my router, usually resolves itself. There has been 1 time where it became completely unresponsive, so I unplugged the unit from my tv and wall and then plugged it back in again and it worked fine. I got this for $19, so I really can't complain.  Love how easy it is to stream Prime videos.
